CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit Search Graph API
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit Search Graph API
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Application Site Creation without Sites.FullControl.All
CurrentVersion.description: Currently an application requires Sites.FullControl.All to create new site collections within a tenant. This work will allow applications to use a new scope, Sites.Create.All, to create new site collections without accessing any existing content. During the site creation process the application can request access to the new site, allowing for provisioning scenarios with reduced tenant permissions.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Application Site Creation without Sites.FullControl.All
OldVersion.description: Currently an application requires Sites.FullControl.All to create new site collections within a tenant. This work will allow applications to use a new scope, Sites.Create.All, to create new site collections without accessing any existing content. During the site creation process the application can request access to the new site, allowing for provisioning scenarios with reduced tenant permissions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - Audit Search Graph API
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - Audit Search Graph API
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Modernized user-defined permissions experience
CurrentVersion.description: A modernized experience for selecting which users should have which permissions when a sensitivity label configured for user-defined permissions is applied to a file in M365 apps or when a user applies protection using standalone Information Rights Management.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Modernized user-defined permissions experience
OldVersion.description: A modernized experience for selecting which users should have which permissions when a sensitivity label configured for user-defined permissions is applied to a file in M365 apps or when a user applies protection using standalone Information Rights Management.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Customize your individual sites and experiences with fonts and themes
CurrentVersion.description: Site owners will now be able to create branded fonts and themes for their sites and experiences in the brand center by combining the branding assets that the organization provides or by creating their own.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Customize your individual sites and experiences with fonts and themes
OldVersion.description: Site owners will now be able to create branded fonts and themes for their sites and experiences in the brand center by combining the branding assets that the organization provides or by creating their own.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Optical character recognition (OCR) support for embedded images in endpoint
CurrentVersion.description: This release will extend OCR support from standalone images (JPEG, JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, and PDF) to images embedded inside the following files and file types: Office files (XLSX, DOCX, PPTX), container files (zip, rar, 7z, and more), and PDF files. Image-only PDF files are already supported, and this this release will support hybrid PDF files containing images and searchable text.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Optical character recognition (OCR) support for embedded images in endpoint
OldVersion.description: This release will extend OCR support from standalone images (JPEG, JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, and PDF) to images embedded inside the following files and file types: Office files (XLSX, DOCX, PPTX), container files (zip, rar, 7z, and more), and PDF files. Image-only PDF files are already supported, and this this release will support hybrid PDF files containing images and searchable text.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint -Update UI/UX admin experience
CurrentVersion.description: Update UI/UX admin experience for advanced configuration settings.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint -Update UI/UX admin experience
OldVersion.description: Update UI/UX admin experience for advanced configuration settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get in the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com (work mode) and in other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Mac. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook for Mac
OldVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get in the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com (work mode) and in other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Mac. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Copilot Compose experience
CurrentVersion.description: Major improvements to our Copilot Compose experience include a polished, lightweight UI.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: New Copilot Compose experience
OldVersion.description: Major improvements to our Copilot Compose experience include a polished, lightweight UI.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Create allow directly in Tenant Allow/Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can create an allow inside the Tenant Allow/Block List to override bulk, spam, and regular confidence phish verdicts directly.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Create allow directly in Tenant Allow/Block List
OldVersion.description: Admins can create an allow inside the Tenant Allow/Block List to override bulk, spam, and regular confidence phish verdicts directly.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Org Explorer in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will now also be available in Outlook for Mac.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Org Explorer in Outlook for Mac
OldVersion.description: Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will now also be available in Outlook for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: View PDFs with Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels on OneDrive Mobile
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, OneDrive users can open PDF files that are protected with Microsoft Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels and read them using OneDrive mobile apps in read-only mode. Only authorized users will be able to access these PDF files.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: View PDFs with Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels on OneDrive Mobile
OldVersion.description: With this capability, OneDrive users can open PDF files that are protected with Microsoft Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels and read them using OneDrive mobile apps in read-only mode. Only authorized users will be able to access these PDF files.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Users can find and use the OneDrive app in Outlook for Mac, for a consistent and fast experience.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive in Outlook for Mac
OldVersion.description: Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Users can find and use the OneDrive app in Outlook for Mac, for a consistent and fast experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint Sites
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to search for and select SharePoint Sites in CIQ to scope their prompts to.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Users can opt-in to try the new calendar in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: The new calendar in Teams combines rich productivity features and the latest innovations like Microsoft Copilot, to help users more seamlessly manage their schedules, prepare for and recap meetings, and even identify optimal days for in-office collaboration. The new calendar in Teams is designed to be familiar and reliable, as it’s one unified calendar that works across new Outlook for Windows, Outlook on the web, Microsoft Places, and now Microsoft Teams. With this update, users will see the ‘New calendar’ toggle at the top right of the calendar app in Teams. New calendar is off by default, and users can toggle to try the new experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Checking feedback policy across all accounts
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, when we determine whether a user is entitled to submit feedback, we only look at the feedback policy for their primary (global) account. Going forward, we are going to make the feedback policy check more restrictive which is more secure. We'll be looking at feedback policies for all users' accounts and basing their eligibility off the most restrictive policy value found. For example, if any of the users' accounts have Feedback disabled by a policy, we won't show the Feedback button in the Help tab of the ribbon for any of their accounts. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Checking feedback policy across all accounts
OldVersion.description: Currently, when we determine whether a user is entitled to submit feedback, we only look at the feedback policy for their primary (global) account. Going forward, we are going to make the feedback policy check more restrictive which is more secure. We'll be looking at feedback policies for all users' accounts and basing their eligibility off the most restrictive policy value found. For example, if any of the users' accounts have Feedback disabled by a policy, we won't show the Feedback button in the Help tab of the ribbon for any of their accounts. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: RSVP response in meeting invite message for shared calendars
CurrentVersion.description: Managers and delegates will be able to see the user who has responded to meeting invites in shared calendars. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web #newoutlookforwindows
